collectible.title: Botan
collectible.subtitle: The Baby Boar
collectible.text: A plushie of a baby boar known as Botan... Wait, did this thing just move?
collectible.unlock: Win a game while Kyou is playing.

collectible.title: Bento
collectible.subtitle: Kyou's Bento Lunchbox
collectible.text: A bento lunchbox made by Kyou for you to enjoy. Smells declicious!
collectible.unlock: Forfeit while playing with Kyou in 3 different games.
